LanguageData.Whohooer.SameRace: Need to be the same species
LanguageData.Whohooer.Credit:
Fertility Starts at 14 in base game The base game forces a second dice role on your pawns age group That's all, thanks for playing. -Alice.
Source Code Available at https://github.com/emipa606/Woohooer
LanguageData.Whohooer.woohooChildChance: How likely do we roll for pregnancy when wohooing: {0}
LanguageData.Whohooer.woohooBabyChildChance: How likely we are to get pregnant when trying for baby: {0}
LanguageData.Whohooer.sameGender: Two people of the same gender can get pregnant

LanguageData.Whohooer.familyWeight: How hard should directly related pawns try to avoid woohoo (0% dont care, 100% always avoid): {0}
